title: The tool used for the presentation

content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Cultural presentation (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What does Ms. Kawamura use to present her school?

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
